Package controller

Class HomeScreenController

java.lang.Object
controller.HomeScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class HomeScreenController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class creates a controller for HomeScreen.fxml.

      public void onLogOutButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException

    • onAppointmentAdd

      public void onAppointmentAdd(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      The event handler for the Add Appointment button. The sceneLoader lambda expression is used to direct the user to the Add Appointment screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:

    • onAppointmentUpdate

      public void onAppointmentUpdate(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      The event handler for the Update Appointment button. The selected appointment and its index are passed into passAppointmentSelection(). An error message is displayed if the selected appointment is null The sceneLoader lambda expression is used to direct the user to the Update Appointment screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onAppointmentDelete

      public void onAppointmentDelete(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      The event handler method for the Delete Appointment button. Dialogue boxes appear to confirm the Delete, alert the user if the selected appointment is null, and confirm which appointment was deleted The appointment is removed from the database.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      SQLException
      IOException

    • onCustomerUpdate

      public void onCustomerUpdate(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      The event handler for the Update Customer button. The selected customer and its index are passed into passCustomerSelection(). An error message is displayed if the selected customer is null The sceneLoader lambda expression is used to direct the user to the Update Appointment screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onCustomerDelete

      public void onCustomerDelete(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      The event handler method for the Delete Customer button. Dialogue boxes appear to confirm the Delete, alert the user if the selected customer is null, and confirm which customer was deleted The customer is removed from the database.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • onAllAppointmentRadio

      public void onAllAppointmentRadio(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      The event handler method for the All Appointments radio. The allAppointmentsTable is populated with all the appointments in the allAppts list.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • onMonthlyAppointmentRadio

      public void onMonthlyAppointmentRadio(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      The event handler method for the Monthly Appointments radio. A new observable list is populated by iterating through the allAppts list and comparing the start date to the current month. The allAppointmentsTable is populated with appointments in the monthlyAppointments list.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • onWeeklyAppointmentRadio

      public void onWeeklyAppointmentRadio(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      The event handler method for the Weekly Appointments radio. A new observable list is populated by iterating through the allAppts list and comparing the start date to the previous Sunday and last Saturday. The allAppointmentsTable is populated with the appointments in the weeklyAppointments list.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • onReportSelectionButton

      public void onReportSelectionButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      The event handler for the Report Selection button. The sceneLoader lambda expression is used to direct the user to the Report Selection screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      The first method called when the HomeScreenController is initialized. This method sets the data that will populate the allCustomersTable and allAppointmentsTable.
